commits.subject: Cycles: Remove meaningless camera ray check
Fix T51450: viewport render time keeps increasing after render is done.
Fix Cycles multi scatter GGX different render results with Clang and GCC.
Fix T52152: allow zero roughness for Cycles principled BSDF, don't clamp.
Fix Cycles denoising NaNs with a 1 sample renders.
Fix use of uninitialized value in Cycles, probably did not cause a bug.
Fix a few harmless maybe uninitialized warnings with GCC 5.4.
Fix T52135: Cycles should not keep generated/packed images in memory after render.
Fix potential memory leak in Cycles loading of packed/generated images.
Fix T52125: principled BSDF missing with macOS OpenCL.
Cycles: fixed the SM_2x CUDA kernel build that I broke in my previous commit
Fix T52107: Color management difference when using multiple and different GPUs together
Fix T52021: Shadow catcher renders wrong when catcher object is behind transparent object
Cycles: remove min bounces, modify RR to terminate less.
Cycles: Extra tweaks to performance of header expansion
Cycles: Avoid some expensive operations in header expansions
Cycles: Support "precompiled" headers in include expansion algorithm
Cycles: Speed up #include expansion algorithm
Fix Cycles CUDA adaptive megakernel build error.
Cycles: CUDA split performance tweaks, still far from megakernel.
Cycles: Pack kernel textures into buffers for OpenCL
Cycles: Cleanup, move curve intersection functions to own file
Cycles: Cleanup, trailign whitespace
Cycles: Cleanup, remove bvh prefix from curve functions
Cycles: Fix compilation error on NVidia OpenCL after recent refactor
Fix Cycles shadow catcher objects influencing each other.
Fix Windows build errors with recent Cycles SIMD refactoring.
Cycles: Cleanup, space after keyword
Code refactor: use float4 instead of intrinsics for CPU denoise filtering.
Code refactor: add, remove, optimize various SSE functions.
Code refactor: split defines into separate header, changes to SSE type headers.
Cycles: remove option to disable transparent shadows globally.
Fix T52229: Shadow Catcher artifacts when under transparency
Cycles: remove square samples option.
Cycles: change defaults for filter glossy, clamp and branched path AA.
Fix T52322: denoiser broken on Windows after recent changes.
Cycles: Fix instanced shadow catcher objects influencing each other
Cycles: De-duplicate trace-time object visibility calculation
Cycles: Remove ulong usage
Cycles: Proper fix for recent OpenCL image crash
Revert "Cycles: Fix crash changing image after recent OpenCL changes"
Cycles: More fixes for Windows 32 bit
Cycles: Fix compilation error of filter kernels on 32 bit Windows
Cycles: Fix crash changing image after recent OpenCL changes
Cycles: Fix compilation error without C++11
Cycles: Cleanup, de-duplicate function parameter list
Cycles: Add utility macro ccl_ref
Improved triangle sampling for mesh lights
Cycles: Calculate correct remaining time when using a larger pixel size
Cycles/BI: Add a pixel size option for speeding up viewport rendering
Cycles: Fixed broken camera motion blur when motion was not set to center on frame
Cycles: Guard memcpy to potentially re-allocating memory with lock
Code cleanup: make L_transparent part of PathRadiance.
Code cleanup: make DebugData part of PathRadiance.
Code cleanup: make it easier to test only Sobol, CMJ or Pseudorandom.
Cycles: optimize CPU split kernel data init.
Code cleanup: remove unused Cycles random number code.
Fix T52372: CUDA build error after recent changes.
Fix T52368: OSL trace() crash after recent changes.
Code cleanup: fix warning and improve terminology.
Cycles: Clarify new argument in PathRadiance
Fix T52443: Cycles OpenCL build error after recent mesh lights changes.
Cycles: Fix for a division by zero that could happen with solid angle triangle light sampling
Fix Cycles CUDA transparent shadow error after recent fix in c22b52c.
Code cleanup: remove shader context.
Cycles: Add maximum depth stat to bvh builder
Fix implementation of atomic update max and move to a central location
Fix T51805: Overlapping volumes renders incorrect on AMD GPU
Fix panorama render crash with split kernel, due to incorrect buffer pointer.
Cycles: reorganize Performance panel layout, move viewport BVH type to debug.
Cycles: attempt to recover from crashing CUDA/OpenCL drivers on Windows.
Revert "Cycles: remove square samples option."

Cycles: support baking normals plugged into BSDFs, averaged with closure weight.

Fix Cycles Windows render errors with BVH2 CPU rendering.
Cycles: Cleanup, naming of variable
Cycles: Add assert to catch possibly wrong logic
Cycles: Mark pixels with negative values as outliers
Cycles: Add utility function to query current value of scoped timer

commits.subject: Cycles: Remove meaningless camera ray check
Fix T51450: viewport render time keeps increasing after render is done.
Fix Cycles multi scatter GGX different render results with Clang and GCC.
Fix T52152: allow zero roughness for Cycles principled BSDF, don't clamp.
Fix Cycles denoising NaNs with a 1 sample renders.
Fix use of uninitialized value in Cycles, probably did not cause a bug.
Fix a few harmless maybe uninitialized warnings with GCC 5.4.
Fix T52135: Cycles should not keep generated/packed images in memory after render.
Fix potential memory leak in Cycles loading of packed/generated images.
Fix T52125: principled BSDF missing with macOS OpenCL.
Cycles: fixed the SM_2x CUDA kernel build that I broke in my previous commit
Fix T52107: Color management difference when using multiple and different GPUs together
Fix T52021: Shadow catcher renders wrong when catcher object is behind transparent object
Cycles: remove min bounces, modify RR to terminate less.
Cycles: Extra tweaks to performance of header expansion
Cycles: Avoid some expensive operations in header expansions
Cycles: Support "precompiled" headers in include expansion algorithm
Cycles: Speed up #include expansion algorithm
Fix Cycles CUDA adaptive megakernel build error.
Cycles: CUDA split performance tweaks, still far from megakernel.
Cycles: Pack kernel textures into buffers for OpenCL
Cycles: Cleanup, move curve intersection functions to own file
Cycles: Cleanup, trailign whitespace
Cycles: Cleanup, remove bvh prefix from curve functions
Cycles: Fix compilation error on NVidia OpenCL after recent refactor
Fix Cycles shadow catcher objects influencing each other.
Fix Windows build errors with recent Cycles SIMD refactoring.
Cycles: Cleanup, space after keyword
Code refactor: use float4 instead of intrinsics for CPU denoise filtering.
Code refactor: add, remove, optimize various SSE functions.
Code refactor: split defines into separate header, changes to SSE type headers.
Cycles: remove option to disable transparent shadows globally.
Fix T52229: Shadow Catcher artifacts when under transparency
Cycles: remove square samples option.
Cycles: change defaults for filter glossy, clamp and branched path AA.
Fix T52322: denoiser broken on Windows after recent changes.
Cycles: Fix instanced shadow catcher objects influencing each other
Cycles: De-duplicate trace-time object visibility calculation
Cycles: Remove ulong usage
Cycles: Proper fix for recent OpenCL image crash
Revert "Cycles: Fix crash changing image after recent OpenCL changes"
Cycles: More fixes for Windows 32 bit
Cycles: Fix compilation error of filter kernels on 32 bit Windows
Cycles: Fix crash changing image after recent OpenCL changes
Cycles: Fix compilation error without C++11
Cycles: Cleanup, de-duplicate function parameter list
Cycles: Add utility macro ccl_ref
Fix T52443: Cycles OpenCL build error after recent mesh lights changes.
Cycles: Fix for a division by zero that could happen with solid angle triangle light sampling
Improved triangle sampling for mesh lights
Cycles: Calculate correct remaining time when using a larger pixel size
Cycles/BI: Add a pixel size option for speeding up viewport rendering
Cycles: Fixed broken camera motion blur when motion was not set to center on frame
Cycles: Guard memcpy to potentially re-allocating memory with lock
Code cleanup: make L_transparent part of PathRadiance.
Code cleanup: make DebugData part of PathRadiance.
Code cleanup: make it easier to test only Sobol, CMJ or Pseudorandom.
Cycles: optimize CPU split kernel data init.
Code cleanup: remove unused Cycles random number code.
Fix T52372: CUDA build error after recent changes.
Fix T52368: OSL trace() crash after recent changes.
Code cleanup: fix warning and improve terminology.
Cycles: Clarify new argument in PathRadiance
Fix Cycles CUDA transparent shadow error after recent fix in c22b52c.
Code cleanup: remove shader context.
Cycles: Add maximum depth stat to bvh builder
Fix implementation of atomic update max and move to a central location
Fix T51805: Overlapping volumes renders incorrect on AMD GPU
Fix panorama render crash with split kernel, due to incorrect buffer pointer.
Cycles: reorganize Performance panel layout, move viewport BVH type to debug.
Cycles: attempt to recover from crashing CUDA/OpenCL drivers on Windows.
Revert "Cycles: remove square samples option."
Fix T52470: cycles OpenCL hair rendering not working after recent changes.
Code cleanup: deduplicate some bsdf node methods.
Cycles: support baking normals plugged into BSDFs, averaged with closure weight.
Code cleanup: remove copy of shader graph for bump, no longer needed.
Fix T52452: OSL trace broken after shadow catcher recent changes.
Code cleanup: move rng into path state.
Fix T52661: mesh light shader using backfacing not working, after new sampling.
Fix T52652: Cycles image box mapping has flipped textures.
Cycles: Fix compilation error with CUDA after recent changes
Fix T52433: Volume Absorption color tint
Cycles: Cleanup, style
Cycles: Fix compilation warning
Fix T52533: Blender shuts down when rendering duplicated smoke domain
Cycles: follow strict class naming convention
Cycles: Cleanup, indentation and trailing whitespace
Cycles: Fix typo in comment
Fixing T52477 - switching from custom ray/triangle intersection code to the one from util_intersection.h. This fixes the bug and makes the code more readable and maintainable.
Cycles: Fix build with networking enabled
Fix Cycles Windows render errors with BVH2 CPU rendering.
Cycles: Cleanup, naming of variable
Cycles: Add assert to catch possibly wrong logic
Cycles: Mark pixels with negative values as outliers
Cycles: Add utility function to query current value of scoped timer
Cycles: Correct logging of sued CPU intrisics
Cycles: Fix stack overflow during traversal caused by floating overflow
Cycles: FIx issue with -0 being considered a non-finite value
Cycles: change AO bounces approximation to do more glossy and transmission.
Fix rare firefly in volume equiangular sampling when sampling short distance.
Cycles: improve sample stratification on area lights for path tracing.
Fix Cycles bug in RR termination, probability should never be > 1.0.
Cycles: Tweaks to avoid compilation error of megakernel
Cycles: Attempt to work around compilation of sm_20 and sm_21
Cycles: disable fast math flags, only use a subset.
Fix T52660: CUDA volume texture rendering not working on Fermi GPUs.
Code cleanup: deduplicate some branched and split kernel code.
Code cleanup: tweak inlining for 2% better CUDA performance with hair.
Code cleanup: avoid used of uninitialized value in case of precision issue.
Code cleanup: abstract shadow catcher logic more into accumulation code.
Fix Cycles adaptive compile without volumes broken after recent changes.
Cycles: Fix compilation error with OpenCL split kernel
Fix T51416: Blender Crashes while moving Sliders
Code cleanup: store branch factor in PathState.
Code cleanup: remove SOBOL_SKIP hack, seems no longer needed.
Code cleanup: remove hack to avoid seeing transparent objects in noise.
Code cleanup: refactor BSSRDF closure sampling, for next commit.
Fix T52368: Cycles OSL trace() failing on Windows 32 bit.
Fix T52853: harmless Cycles test failure in debug mode.
Cycles: use defensive sampling for picking BSDFs and BSSRDFs.
Cycles: slightly improve BSDF sample stratification for path tracing.
Code cleanup: simplify kernel side work stealing code.
Cycles: CUDA faster rendering of small tiles, using multiple samples like OpenCL.
Fix use of uninitialized memory in Cycles normal baking.
Code refactor: zero render buffers outside of kernel.
Code refactor: use split variance calculation for mega kernels too.
Code refactor: remove rng_state buffer and compute hash on the fly.
Code refactor: add WorkTile struct for passing work to kernel.
Fix T52645, T52645: AMD OpenCL compiler crash with recent drivers.
Fix T52981: 2D Curve shapes do not render untill extruded
CMake: support CUDA 9 toolkit, and automatically disable sm_2x binaries.
Fix T52943: don't export curves objects with no faces to Cycles.
Fix Cycles OpenCL compiler error after recent changes.
Fix T52574: make Cycles rendered tile counter more clear.
Cycles: reduce subsurface stack memory usage.
Code refactor: simplify CUDA context push/pop.
Cycles: Cleanup, indentation
Cycles: Fix compilation error of OpenCL megakernel on Apple
Cycles: Fix compilation error of megakernel on NVidia device

Fix T51450: viewport render time keeps increasing after render is done.

Fix Cycles denoising NaNs with a 1 sample renders.
Fix use of uninitialized value in Cycles, probably did not cause a bug.
Fix a few harmless maybe uninitialized warnings with GCC 5.4.

Fix potential memory leak in Cycles loading of packed/generated images.
Fix T52125: principled BSDF missing with macOS OpenCL.
Cycles: fixed the SM_2x CUDA kernel build that I broke in my previous commit
Fix T52107: Color management difference when using multiple and different GPUs together
Fix T52021: Shadow catcher renders wrong when catcher object is behind transparent object
Cycles: remove min bounces, modify RR to terminate less.

Cycles: Support "precompiled" headers in include expansion algorithm
Cycles: Speed up #include expansion algorithm
Fix Cycles CUDA adaptive megakernel build error.
Cycles: CUDA split performance tweaks, still far from megakernel.
Cycles: Pack kernel textures into buffers for OpenCL
Cycles: Cleanup, move curve intersection functions to own file
Cycles: Cleanup, trailign whitespace
Cycles: Cleanup, remove bvh prefix from curve functions
Cycles: Fix compilation error on NVidia OpenCL after recent refactor
Fix Cycles shadow catcher objects influencing each other.
Fix Windows build errors with recent Cycles SIMD refactoring.
Cycles: Cleanup, space after keyword
Code refactor: use float4 instead of intrinsics for CPU denoise filtering.
Code refactor: add, remove, optimize various SSE functions.
Code refactor: split defines into separate header, changes to SSE type headers.
Cycles: remove option to disable transparent shadows globally.
Fix T52229: Shadow Catcher artifacts when under transparency
Cycles: remove square samples option.
Cycles: change defaults for filter glossy, clamp and branched path AA.
Fix T52322: denoiser broken on Windows after recent changes.

Cycles: Remove ulong usage

Revert "Cycles: Fix crash changing image after recent OpenCL changes"

Cycles: Fix compilation error without C++11
Cycles: Cleanup, de-duplicate function parameter list
Cycles: Add utility macro ccl_ref
Improved triangle sampling for mesh lights
Cycles: Calculate correct remaining time when using a larger pixel size
Cycles/BI: Add a pixel size option for speeding up viewport rendering

Code cleanup: make L_transparent part of PathRadiance.
Code cleanup: make DebugData part of PathRadiance.
Code cleanup: make it easier to test only Sobol, CMJ or Pseudorandom.
Cycles: optimize CPU split kernel data init.

Fix T52368: OSL trace() crash after recent changes.
Code cleanup: fix warning and improve terminology.

Fix T52443: Cycles OpenCL build error after recent mesh lights changes.

Fix Cycles CUDA transparent shadow error after recent fix in c22b52c.
Code cleanup: remove shader context.

Fix implementation of atomic update max and move to a central location
Fix T51805: Overlapping volumes renders incorrect on AMD GPU
Fix panorama render crash with split kernel, due to incorrect buffer pointer.

Fix Cycles Windows render errors with BVH2 CPU rendering.
